The AWS CloudFormation template for this Serverless application

/Users/manjunath/Documents/GitHub/demoex.serviceRawFile:
service: demoexpressjs-lambda

provider:
  name: aws
  runtime: nodejs18.x
  region: ap-south-1
  memorySize: 256
  timeout: 10

functions:
  # contacts:
  #   handler: handlers/contactHandler.handler
  #   package:
  #     individually: true
  #     include:
  #       - handlers/contactHandler.js
  #       - controllers/contactController.js
  #       - models/contactModel.js
  #     exclude:
  #       - controllers/**
  #       - models/**
  #   events:
  #     - http:
  #         path: api/contacts/{proxy+}
  #         method: ANY
  #         cors: true
  #     - http:
  #         path: api/contacts
  #         method: ANY
  #         cors: true

  users:
    handler: handlers/userHandler.handler
    package:
      individually: true
      include:
        - handlers/userHandler.js
        - controllers/userController.js
        - models/dynamoDbUserModel.js
        - routes/userRoutes.js
      exclude:
        - controllers/**
        - models/**
        - routes/**
        - scripts/**
    events:
      - http:
          path: api/auth/{proxy+}
          method: ANY
          cors: true
      - http:
          path: api/auth
          method: ANY
          cors: true

package:
  individually: true
  exclude:
    - tests/**
    - docs/**
    - .git/**
    - "*.md"
